column2: "Na ɔdze me sanee baa fi no n’abowano; na hwɛ

column4: esu fi nyimfa kwan no do repem."

column3: osusuu ahaenum; na esutsen a munntum nntwa a: osiandɛ esu no eyir ayɛ esu a wɔbor wɔ mu

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ apofo begyinagyina ho: ofitsi En-gedi araa dze kodu En-eglaim ɔbɛyɛ asawu hatabea; no mu nam bɛyɛ ahorow
column3: dɛ po kɛse no mu nam

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Iyi nye he a hom dze bɛkyɛ asaase no ama Israel mbusuakuw duebien no dɛ egyapadze: Josef benya kyɛpɛn."
"Na hom nkyɛ ndzi do
column3: baako nedze nyɛ dɛ biara so nedze; ɔno no ho na memaa me nsa do dɛ medze bɛma hom egyanom: na asaase yi bɛda hɔ ama hom dɛ egyapadze."

column2: "Na iyi nyɛ asaase no ne he: kwaamu afamu
column3: ofi po kɛse no ho
column5: dze besi kwan a wɔdze kɔ Zedad no do;"

column2: "Hamat
column3: Berotha
column4: Sibraim a ɔda Damaskɔs he na Hamat he ntamu no; Hazer-hatikon a ɔda Hauran he ho no."

column2: "Na he a ofi po ho nye Hazar-enan a ɔda Damaskɔs ntoaado
column3: na kwaamu afamu he a ɔda kwaamu afamu no
column4: ɔnyɛ Hamat. Iyi nye mbrɛ odzi kɔ kwaamu afamu no."

column2: "Na boka afamu he a ɔda Hauran na Damaskɔs na Gilead
column3: ɔnye Israel asaase ntamu no
column4: ɔnyɛ Jordan; hom nsusu mfi kwaamu afamu he no ho nkɔ boka po no ho
column5: iyi nye mbrɛ odzi kɔ boka afamu."

column2: "Na pomu afamu he a ɔda pomu afamu no
column3: ɔnyɛ mbrɛ ofi Tamar wɔ Meribat kades esu no ho araa dze nam Egypt ɔwora no n’ano araa dze kodu po kɛse no ano. Iyi nye mbrɛ odzi kɔ pomu afamu wɔ pomu afamu no."

column2: "Na anee afamu he no ɔnyɛ po kɛse no
column3: ofitsi pomu afamu he no ano araa dze kesi Hamat ne tsentsendo. Iyi nye mbrɛ odzi kɔ anee afamu."

column2: "Dɛm na hom nsi nkyɛ asaase yi mu mfa dɛ mbrɛ Israel mbusuakuw tsetsee."

"Na ɔmbra dɛ hom bɔtwe tonto akyɛ egyapadze ama hom ho na ananaben a wɔaba hom mu ahɔhotsena a wɔbɔwowo mba wɔ hom mu no; na wɔnyɛ mma hom dɛ hɔn a wɔwo hɔn wɔ Israelmba mu; wɔnye hom nnya egyapadze wɔ Israel mbusuakuw mu."
"Na ɔmbra dɛ ebusuakuw biara a ɔnanaben no bɛba hɔ ahɔhotsena no
